EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Disciple: Emissary
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Follow the path of Light or Dark

EnhancementSelection.Name: Deacon of Endless Darkness
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your mastery over Darkness has granted you impossible power. +4 Wisdom, +2 to all Saving Throws, and +10 Negative spellpower and negative healing amp. You gain +1 caster level and max caster level with Negative Energy spells and +1 Necromancy DCs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Divine Emissary of Light
EnhancementSelection.Description: You have chosen to follow the path of Light. For each Light Core Ability you take in this tree, you gain +5 Light, Good, and Lawful Spellpower.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Disciple: Emissary
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Follow the path of Light or Dark

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dark Spellbook III: Power Word: Stun
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Your Cleric spellbook gains Power Word: Stun as a level 8 spell. You also gain +1 Caster Level and Max Caster Level with Negative Spells.
Power Word: Stun A single word of power is uttered, causing your target to become stunned. Creatures with 150 or fewer current HP are stunned to 4 to 32 seconds, creatures with 151 to 300 HP are stunned for 2 to 16 seconds, and creatures with 301 HPs or more are stunned for 8 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Light Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: +2 to all saving throws and +3 Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Disciple: Emissary
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Follow the path of Light or Dark

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dark Spellbook II: Necrotic Ray
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Your Cleric spellbook gains Necrotic Ray as a level 6 spell.
Necrotic Ray: Blasts a target with a negative energy ray that does 5 to 8 negative energy damage per caster level to a living enemy. A successful Fortitude save reduces the damage by half. The ray also suppresses the life force of any living creature it strikes, granting it a negative level.
D&D Dice: Deals 1d4+4 negative energy damage per caster level and bestowes one negative level.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Light Spellbook I: Sun Bolt
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Your Cleric spellbook gains Sun Bolt as a level 3 spell.
Sun Bolt: Powerful line of light deals 4 to 9 light damage per caster level (up to a max of 60 to 153 damage at caster level 15) to targets in its path. A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half.
D&D Dice: Deals 1d4+3 light damage per caster (max 15d6+45)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Disciple: Emissary
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Follow the path of Light or Dark

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dark Spellbook I: Enervation
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Your Cleric spellbook gains Enervation as a level 4 spell.
Enervation: A black ray or crackling negative energy suppresses the life force of any living creature it strikes, giving an enemy 1 to 4 negative levels. If the target has as many negative levels as its hit dice or levels, it dies. Each negative level gives a creature a -2 penalty on attack rolls, saves, skill checks, ability checks, and effective level. Negative levels stack. As a ray this spell has double range.
D&D Dice: Gives enemies 1d4 negative levels.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Light Spellbook II: Sunbeam
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Your Cleric spellbook gains Sunbeam as a level 6 spell.
Sunbeam: Deals 8 to 13 light damage per caster level with a mighty beam of sunlight, and temporarily blinds the target. Against Undead or Oozes, it does double damage. A successful Reflex save halves the damage and negates the blind effect. This spell has double range.
D&D Dice: Deals 1d6+7 light damage per caster level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Disciple: Emissary
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Follow the path of Light or Dark

EnhancementSelection.Name: Light Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: +2 to all saving throws and +3 Physical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Light Spellbook III: Sunburst
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Your Cleric spellbook gains Sunburst as a level 8 spell.
Sunburst: A globe of searing radiance explodes to blast targets for 5 to 10 light damage per caster level in addition to blinding them. Oozes and Undead take double this damage. A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half and negates the blindness. Light fearing undead may be instantly destroyed by this spell.
D&D Dice: Deals 1d6+4 light damage per caster level, double tun Undead and Oozes.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Disciple: Emissary
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Follow the path of Light or Dark

EnhancementSelection.Name: Divine Emissary of Darkness
EnhancementSelection.Description: You have chsoen to follow the path of Darkness. For each Sark Core Ability you take in this tree, you gain +5 Negative, Evil, and Chaos Spellpower.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Priest of Endless Light
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your mastery over Light has granted you impossible power. +4 Wisdom, +2 to all Saving Throws, and +10 Light/Alignment spellpower and positive healing amp. You gain +1 caster level and max caster level with Light/Alignment spells and +1 evocation DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Disciple: Prophetic Zenith I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain a new Spell-like ability

EnhancementSelection.Name: Chill Touch
EnhancementSelection.Description: (Activation Cost: 4/3/2 spell points. Cooldown: 6/5/4 seconds.) Requires Divine Emissary of Darkness

EnhancementSelection.Name: Nimbus of Light
EnhancementSelection.Description: (Activation Cost: 4/3/2 spell points. Cooldown: 6/5/4 seconds.) Requires Divine Emissary of Light

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Disciple: Spellpower I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a type of spellpower to gain

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spellpower: Light
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[5/10/15] Light Spellpower Requires Divine Emissary of Light

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spellpower: Negative
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[5/10/15] Negative/Poison Spellpower Requires Divine Emissary of Darkness

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spellpower: Universal
EnhancementSelection.Description: +3/+6/+9 Universal Spellpower

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Disciple: Divine Vitality
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Channel Divinity: Your target ally gains [3/5/7]d4+10 spellpoints. This ability cannot target yourself. (Cooldown: 2 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Disciple: Spell Criticals I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose which of your spells gain enhanced Critical Chance

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spell Critical: Negative
EnhancementSelection.Description: +2% Critical Chance with Negative/Poison Energy spells Requires Divine Emissary of Darkness

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spell Critical: Light
EnhancementSelection.Description: +2% Critical Chance with Light spells Requires Divine Emissary of Light

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spell Critical: Universal
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1% Critical Chance with spells

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Disciple: Spell Points
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[30/60/90] Spell Points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Disciple: Spell Penetration
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to your Caster Level check to overcome enemy spell resistance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Disciple: Spellpower II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a type of spellpower to gain

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spellpower: Fire
EnhancementSelection.Description: +6/+12/+18 Fire Spellpower

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spellpower: Force
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[5/10/15] Force Spellpower

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spellpower: Universal
EnhancementSelection.Description: +3/+6/+9 Universal Spellpower

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Disciple: Efficient Metamagic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one of the following Metamagic feats. Reduce the spell point cost of using that Metamagic.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Empower Spell Metamagic costs you 2/4/6 fewer Spell Points

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Enlarge
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Enlarge Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Maximize
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Maximize Spell Metamagic costs you 3/6/9 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Quicken
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Quicken Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points
